Animal Crossing - New Leaf *REPACK* (EUR)
Downloaded From Fort42: GateShark

Credits and instructions:
http://www.fort42.com/gateshark/game261/
----------------------------------------------------

[L+A for 99k Bells in slot 1]
DD000000 00000201
D3000000 10000000
25FBEDD0 00000012
25FBEDD1 00000021

[Item in Slot 1 (With Item ID list)]
DD000000 00000201
D3000000 10000000
25FBEDD0 000000FE
25FBEDD1 0000007F
